subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Claude Giroux deflected Matt Carle’s shot past the Chicago Blackhawks goaltender Antti Niemi at 5 minutes 59 seconds of overtime to give the Philadelphia Flyers a thrilling victory.
snippet: Claude Giroux deflected Matt Carle’s shot past the Chicago Blackhawks goaltender Antti Niemi at 5 minutes 59 seconds of overtime to give the Philadelphia Flyers a thrilling victory.
